text: Kilekoile etu nimite amikhan mon dangor kore: aru amikhan laga thik bhabona pora etu gawahi di ase, amikhan ji kaam etu prithibi te korise, etu pobitro aru hosa mon pora korise, aru mangso laga buddhi pora nohoi, kintu Isor laga kripa pora, aru asol to apuni khan logot te he kaam to bisi korise.
